bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition with sores growing in the throat, a swelling that does not ache, holes developing after some time that release malodorous qi, and a lack of appetite. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry gou ju 枸橘 quotes Zhi qi ji fang 治奇疾方 : 咽喉怪證：咽喉生瘡，層層如疊，不痛，日久 有竅出臭氣，廢飲食 , “ Strange condition of the throat : The throat develops sores with several layers as if folded. They do not ache. After an extended period of time they develop a hole to release malodorous qi. [Patients] refrain from drinking and eating”.
